scripts.db:migrate:dev: wrangler d1 migrations apply table-matcher-dev --env dev --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.db:migrate:prod: wrangler d1 migrations apply table-matcher-prod --env prod --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.db:migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply table-matcher-dev --local --env dev --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.deploy:dev: bun run build:cf && wrangler deploy --env dev --config wrangler.jsonc
scripts.deploy:prod: bun run build:cf && wrangler deploy --env prod --config wrangler.jsonc
